snippet.title: 2020 Roots of Pacha - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist and follow us on Steam - https://bit.ly/Roots_of_Pacha_Steam
Join Roots of Pacha Discord - https://bit.ly/Roots_of_Pacha_Discord
Watch the latest trailer: https://youtu.be/lECuTMiGiKc

Crytivo and Soda Den are proud to unveil Roots of Pacha, an online co-op, farming, and life-simulation RPG set during the Stone Age. Grab your friends and some rocks (whichever is more useful) and start building the world’s first and finest farming village!

Learn more at http://rootsofpacha.com/

#LifeSimulation #Farming #Gaming #StoneAge
